posts.name: Aditya
posts.cooked:
Hello Sir, there is a discrepancy in my project 1 score. I have received 100 in project submission as well as peer grading, but my dashboard score is showing 96. I have also not received any discrepancy form link; can you please once check? @carlton

Screenshot 2024-09-05 at 8.06.18 AM1732×508 50.8 KB

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: Will confirm by today with operations (don’t worry I’m camping outside their office until all outstanding issues get solved today). Still some backend issues are being sorted.

posts.name: Aditya
posts.cooked: Okay sir, thank you for your reply

posts.name: Smita Dhadhal
posts.cooked:
@carlton

For me the calculation of project 1 score is having some mistakes.My submission has 100 marks and peer review has 91 marks . So the score for project 1 should come out as 98.5 considering 80:20 ratio. But it is showing 94. It was supposed to be updated today . This is the mistake which has happened with very few students thts why I am a bit worried . Has it been updated for others and I am the only one whose score did not update ? Please check this.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: It is being corrected (updates are done in batch processing and happen overnight). Some changes may reflect immediately, others will take a little time to come through.

posts.name: Aditya
posts.cooked: @carlton Sir, the issue persists, and the score has not been updated yet. Could you please confirm if it’s still in the processing stage or if the update is complete?

posts.name: tripti dwivedi
posts.cooked: Sir, it has not been updated yet; it’s still showing the previous score.

posts.name: Aditya Swaroop
posts.cooked:
Respected sir,

My project 1 Score is showing 96 however, my project submission has 100 marks and peer review has 98 marks. By calculating from 80:20 ratio it is coming out to be 99.6.
I request you to kindly look into this matter at the earliest.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
There are multiple score problems for every student. Its a system wide issue that we have been working on for days. The reason you are not seeing the corrected scores is because we have not pushed the corrected scores yet.

They will be pushed today after 10am

posts.name: tripti dwivedi
posts.cooked: @Carlton Sir, my score for Project 1 has not been updated yet.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: I have forwarded your concern to @jkmadathil

posts.name: Harini
posts.cooked:
@carlton Sir, my project 1 score is incorrectly published on dashboard whereas the grades tab still shows that evaluation is pending, and my final course grade has been incorrectly published already. Please look into this.

image1083×331 31.7 KB

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: I have forwarded your query to @jkmadathil

posts.name: tripti dwivedi
posts.cooked: @Carlton Sir, it is still the same. My Project 1 score has not been updated yet.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: I have forwarded your concern to @jkmadathil

posts.cooked: @Carlton Sir, it is still the same.
